name: Clock Tower: Time Attack
description:
DESCRIPTION
Ascend the Clock tower before time runs out! All manners of chronometers are after the time you have left so be careful!

Made for the Itch mini jam 85 with the limitation of one-minute timer

CONTROLS
WASD or Arrow Keys - Move

Left Mouse Click - Shoot

ESC - Options

CREDITS
Programmer and artist: Bix Men

Sound Designer: Pablo Escalante
https://soundcloud.com/pablo-escalante-10

Artist: Courtney Ridzon
https://www.instagram.com/a_meh_artist/

Font: Adam Little

NOTE: Only the download files that are specified to be the original are originals.
